user_query: I'm planning a road trip from Central to Eastern Kenya and I want to explore the magical places in each region. Can you provide me with the top 5 rated destinations in Central and Eastern? Also, give me the weather forecast for today in those regions. Finally, recommend some local dishes that I should try along the way.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top 5 rated destinations in Central Kenya.
Fetch the top 5 rated destinations in Eastern Kenya.
Get the weather forecast for today in Central Kenya.
Get the weather forecast for today in Eastern Kenya.
Recommend local dishes to try along the road trip route from Central to Eastern Kenya.
